java.com.checkout.dao
Interface ItemDetailsDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemDetailsDaoImpl
public interface ItemDetailsDao

This interface provides data access layer to perform operations on ItemDetails table/object

Author:
vinay

Method Summary
 void addItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price, int purchaseQuantity, int atPriceQuantity)
          This method provides facility to service layer to add a new item in the system and throws exception if item already exists
 ItemDetails findItem(java.lang.String itemName)
          This method will provide facility to service layer to search for an item based on item name provided as an input
 java.util.List<ItemDetails> searchAllItems()
          This method will provide facility to service layer to search for all items in the system and will return a list containing all of them
 void updateItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price)
          This method provides facility to service layer to update only price of an existing item in the system and it will throw an exception if item to update does not exist
 void updateItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price, int purchaseQuantity, int atPriceQuantity)
          This method provides facility to service layer to update price and discount quantity of an existing item in the system and it will throw an exception if item to update does not exist
 

Method Detail

searchAllItems

java.util.List<ItemDetails> searchAllItems()
This method will provide facility to service layer to search for all items in the system and will return a list containing all of them

Returns:
List of items

findItem

ItemDetails findItem(java.lang.String itemName)
This method will provide facility to service layer to search for an item based on item name provided as an input

Parameters:
itemName - Name of item we are looking for in the system
Returns:
ItemDetails object containing all information about the item

addItem

void addItem(java.lang.String itemName,
             int price,
             int purchaseQuantity,
             int atPriceQuantity)
             throws java.lang.Exception
This method provides facility to service layer to add a new item in the system and throws exception if item already exists

Parameters:
itemName - name of the item
price - regular price of the item
purchaseQuantity - quantity that can be purchased with discount
atPriceQuantity - quantity which will be used to calculate discounted price
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

updateItem

price -

ItemDoesNotExistException
